snippet.title: Spindle - Kickstarter Teaser Trailer 💀🐷
snippet.description:
Visit https://www.spindle-adventure.com for signing up for our Kickstarter notification mail service.

♦︎ Twitter: https://twitter.com/spindleDev

Spindle is a modern old school Action Adventure where you are the Death and have to solve the mystery of why people are not able to die anymore. And you have a Pig as a companion. 
The game uses the Godot game engine and is made by three people.
We planning a Kickstarter for this year and we hope, that you will believe in us and in the game by supporting us!
